item.title: Some remarks on Remark42, and how to set it up
item.author: Author
item.description: One of the challenges of starting a blog like this is to add a commenting mechanism in order to connect with your audience. There are many options available, but today I’ll be explaining why I’ve chosen Remark, what are it’s particular advantages which make me choose it over other options, and how did I set it up on my site. This particular guide is aimed primarily toward fellow Hugo users, but I think it can be followed by others as well, due to the way I hacked it into my blog.
